form.title: Build a edit/add form from a table
form.overview: This form allows you to input the basic information needed to build a form for editing or adding data for a particular table for your module. Select the database table from the dropdown, and fill in the information required and click the Generate button.

item.name: dropdownfromtable
item.label: Select table
item.description: Select the table for which you wish to build a model class.

item.name: modulecode
item.label: Module code
item.description: Provide the input of the module code.

item.name: modulename
item.label: Module name
item.description: Provide the name of the module that you are generating as you wish it to appear on menus and in the module catalogue.

item.name: copyright
item.label: Copyright holder
item.description: Provide the name of the copyright holder of the name that you are generating.
